interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Leyla Milani Hair - Heat Protecting Anti Frizz Shine & Thermal Spray Alcohol-Free, Clean Melon Scent, Hair Repair - Glossilocks Spray - msrp $23
Review Date: 2018/01/31
Store: Leyla Milani Hair
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'spray', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '4.75 Ounce'}
Review Text: I have very dull and lifeless hair, I think it is from too much sun and abuse growing up My hair is light weight but very frizzy so I have to use straighteners or curling irons to have it look decent. This has definitely made my hair shiny and looking great. I just sprayed it on damp hair, I combed it through and then I used a flat iron and I have also used it with the curling iron and I loved the outcome. My hair definitely had alot more life to it. I think if your hair looks good you feel good about yourself. The smell of this spray is amazing, it is like a fresh melon scent. It is super easy to use and I love that it gives my hair a layer of protection from the heated hair appliances and the sun. It is for all hair types and it is very light weight.
Review Title: FANTASTIC SCENT & LOVING THE SHINY HAIR
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Silicone Makeup Sponge 2 Pack Premium Quality Silisponge -Easy To Wash Beauty Sponge Applicator for Flawless Application of Liquid Foundation,Primer, Concealer by SEALUXE
SEALUXE
{'Brand': 'SEALUXE', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.5 x 3.5 x 0.6 inches', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup'}
My 18 year old grand daughter does her full face make up everyday whether she is leaving the house or not. I will admit she is pretty good at it, but she does spend alot of money on it. She had been using a sponge type and what she said that she really likes about this blender is that there is alot less waste of makeup, since the sponge absorbs it and this silicone blender spreads it. She said it spreads alot more evenly also and she was very happy with how she could clean it easily in water after each use.
SPREADS EVENLY & CLEANS EASILY
Leyla Milani Hair Styling Spray - Professional Extra Firm Hold Flexible Hairspray, 3-Level Adjustable Nozzle, Best Heat Resistant Anti-Humidity Finishing Hair Sprays, Hold it Right There (10oz)
Leyla Milani Hair
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '10 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Brand': 'Leyla Milani Hair', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 2 x 1.7 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
I have kind of fine hair, but it is like I have alot of it. My hair normally when I curl it is flat within 1 hour tops. Even when I use hair spray, to even get it to hold I have to use alot of hairspray and then my hair feels so stiff and gross looking. This hair spray held my hair all day long and my hair was not at all stiff or hard or sticky, it was very free flowing. I absolutely love the smell of this hair spray. You adjust the spray flow on the nozzle. So depending on how I want my hair to be for the day is whether I use  the light, the medium or the high spray.
HELD MY HAIR CURLS ALL DAY LONG & SMELLS GREAT
Leyla Milani Hair - Heat Protecting Anti Frizz Shine & Thermal Spray Alcohol-Free, Clean Melon Scent, Hair Repair - Glossilocks Spray - msrp $23

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Demographics**: Likely a family-oriented individual with a keen interest in cosmetics and hair care, particularly for younger generations, such as a granddaughter.
- **Product Usage**: Prefers beauty tools and hair care products that enhance styling efficiency and performance while minimizing product waste.
- **Quality Preference**: Values ease of cleaning and practical functionality, favoring tools and products that ensure hygiene, deliver effective results, and offer adjustable options for personalized use.
- **Importance of Performance**: Prioritizes products that improve makeup application and hair styling for a flawless finish, ensuring even distribution and long-lasting hold while maintaining a natural look.
- **Feedback Behavior**: Actively engages in product reviews, sharing particularly positive experiences when products meet or exceed expectations, with an emphasis on qualities such as scent and hair appearance.
- **Cosmetic Trends**: Draws attention to innovative beauty and hair care products that stand out, especially those providing customizable application methods for optimal results.

Recent interactions indicate a growing interest in versatile hair care products that not only enhance shine and manageability but also protect against heat damage. The user appreciates product scents and values effective performance that fosters a positive self-image, emphasizing the importance of feeling good about one’s appearance. Overall, they seek functional, effective tools and products that are easy to maintain, aiming for excellent results in both personal and family use.
